author: Duchstf
body:
#### PR description:

* This PR extends on the last PR of updated Tau training to include pT calibration. 
* All the results including efficiencies/rate are reported in this talk: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1321399/#17-phase-2-nn-puppi-taus
* The [most current DP Notes](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1298326/#14-dp-note-nn-puppi-taus) include the updated tau training which has been merged: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41492 
* Updated DP Notes coming soon after this PR is merged and verified. 

@aloeliger I was trying to make another PR to l1t-offline cmssw repo but there is no CMSSW_14x versions yet, so I'm making the PR directly here, in principle though they should be the same changes (it doesn't want to automatically merge if I make a PR to [cms-l1t-offline:phase2-l1t-integration-13_3_0_pre3](https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/tree/phase2-l1t-integration-13_3_0_pre3). I assume this is because 

#### PR validation:

* **In progress**, we are planning to use the producers from here: https://github.com/p2l1pfp/FastPUPPI/tree/14_0_X/NtupleProducer
title: Add update for Tau NN with pT calibration
